text: Oreosaurus serranus is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Colombia. ==References== Category:Oreosaurus Category:Reptiles of Colombia Category:Endemic fauna of Colombia Category:Reptiles described in 2017 Category:Taxa named by Santiago J. Sánchez-Pacheco Category:Taxa named by Pedro M. Sales-Nunes Category:Taxa named by Miguel Trefaut Rodrigues Category:Taxa named by Robert W. Murphy
title: Oreosaurus serranus
